284:3: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma kalantakanivāse veṇuvane mahatā bhikṣusaṅaghena sārdhaṃ dviśatapacāśadbhiḥ bhikṣubhiḥ saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattvamahāsattvaiḥ|
284:4: atha bhagavānanekaśatasahasraparivāraparivṛtaḥ purato'valokya dharmaṃ deśayati sma|
284:5: ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇamavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyajanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ prakāśayati sma||
284:6: 2. tadā magadharājaḥ śreṇyo vimvisāraḥ mahātā rājavibhavena mahatā ca rājabalena rājagṛhānmahānagarānniṣkramya yena veṇuvanaṃ yena ca bhagavān tenopasaṅakramīt|
284:7: upasaṅakramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā abhivandya triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte atiṣṭhat|
284:8: ekānte sthitvā magadharājaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ bhagavantametadavocat|
284:9: kathaṃ bhagavan kṛtaṃ karma saṃcayaṃ pratirudhya ciraniruddhaṃ maraṇakāla upasthitaṃ manaso'bhimukhībhavati|
284:12: tadyathā mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapne janapadakalyāṇyā striyā sārdhaṃ paricaret|
284:14: tatkiṃ manyase mahārāja svapne sā janapadakalyāṇī strī||
284:16: 5. bhagavānāha! tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja api nu sa puruṣaḥ kiṃ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet|
284:19: atyantatayā tu bhagavan svapne janapadakalyāṇī strī na saṃvidyate|
284:23: 7. bhagavānāha! evameva mahārāja balo'śrutavān pṛthagjanaścakṣuṣā rūpāṇi ddaṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāni rūpāṇyabhiniviśet|
284:26: saṃrakto rāgajaṃ dveṣajaṃ mohajaṃ karma kāyavāṅmanobhirabhisaṃskaroti|
284:28: niruddhaṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati|
284:35: tat karma kadācinmaraṇa kālasamaya upasthite tatsabhāgasya karmaṇaḥ kṣayāt caramavijñāne niruddhe manaso'bhimukhībhavati|
284:45: tasya ca mahārāja prathamavijñānasya samanantaraniraddhasya tatsabhāgā cittasaṃtatiḥ pravartate|
284:47: tatra mahārāja na kaściddharmaḥ asmāt lokātparalokaṃ saṅkrāmati|
284:63: prathamavijñānasya mahārāja aupapattyaṃśikasya samanantaraniruddhasya nirantarā cittasantatiḥ pravartate|
284:69: 9.yena yena hi nāmnā vai yo yo dharmo'bhilapyate|
284:70: nāsau saṃvidyate tatra dharmāṇāṃ sā hi dharmatā||
284:71: 10. nāmnā hi nāmatā śūnyā nāmnā nāma na vidyate|
284:74: sāpyatra kalpanā śūnyā yayā śūnyā vikalpitāḥ||
284:79: 14. na cakṣūḥ prekṣate rūpaṃ mano dharmānna vetti ca|
284:80: etattu paramaṃ satyaṃ yatra loko na gāhate||
284:82: magadhadeśarājaḥ śreṇyaḥ bimbisāraḥ te bodhisattvāste ca bhikṣavaḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko muditvā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan||
